short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple color picker extension. Easily pick any color on the screen, view a previous history, and copy or clear them with a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Picker is a handy Google Chrome extension that makes it easy to select any color on your screen with just a single click. With this simple tool, you can quickly pick out colors from images, websites, or any other visual content you come across while browsing the web. Color Picker also includes a convenient history feature, allowing you to view your previous selections and easily copy or clear them with just one click. Whether you're a designer, developer, or just someone who appreciates color, Color Picker is a must-have tool for your browser.

Hope you enjoy!
